author: Gregory Carslaw
description:
While other spellcasters study or bargain to gain powers, for the DnD Sorcerer 5e class, magic is something that you are. The Dungeons and Dragons Sorcerer can make for a highly adept, damage-dealing wunderkind, but crafting a refined build that maximizes their many interlocking abilities is a challenge. So, to ease you in, here's our comprehensive Sorcerer class guide.

Continue reading DnD Sorcerer 5e class guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Sorcerer 5e class guide

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The first English-language release of Pokémon’s Mega Evolution series has finally been officially announced and it’s creatively titled: Mega Evolution. This set will launch on September 26 and will - as the same suggests - include lots of Mega Evolution Pokémon, a new type of card that will award up to three prize cards when KOd.

Continue reading Pokémon's Mega Evolution set revealed, and we know almost every ex card in it
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Pokémon's Mega Evolution set revealed, and we know almost every ex card in it

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Magic: The Gathering has revealed the bonus cards in the Sonic the Hedgehog Secret Lair, and it looks like the sales model has been pushed to a whole new level of hideousness.

Continue reading Rare Chaos Emerald Sonic MTG cards show Secret Lair is a lottery now too
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Rare Chaos Emerald Sonic MTG cards show Secret Lair is a lottery now too

author: Chloe Ward
description:
My partner and I are incredibly competitive when it comes to board games. You should have been there when we played Boss Monster; it wasn’t a pretty sight. That’s why we love wholesome, cooperative games like the Stardew Valley Board Game so much. Yes, it's a truckload more complex than Concerned Ape's videogame original, but trust me, it's not as brain-bending as the reviews suggest, and the vibes are perfect. Better still - it’s currently 25% off over at Zatu Games.

Continue reading The Stardew Valley board game is great, actually - and it's 25% off right now
title: The Stardew Valley board game is great, actually - and it's 25% off right now

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The first EDH precon deck for Magic: The Gathering’s upcoming Edge of Eternities set was fully revealed by The Command Zone on July 9. But as well as all the new cards featuring alien insects who love to terraform, the deck’s reprints stand out as one of its most intriguing aspects.

Continue reading The World Shaper MTG deck features a gloriously grindy infinite combo
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: The World Shaper MTG deck features a gloriously grindy infinite combo

author: Mollie Russell
description:
DnD’s next book, Eberron: Forge of the Artificer, will be only 112 pages long, a D&DBeyond blog post confirms. Most first-party 5e books have an average of 200 to 250 pages, so this next supplement will be half the usual size. However, the blog post from July 10 also confirms a lower-than-normal price. Wizards of the Coast’s pre-order page offers physical copies for $29.99 (£22.03).

Continue reading At just 112 pages, DnD's next book is more of a booklet
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: At just 112 pages, DnD's next book is more of a booklet

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Atomic Mass Games has listed a bumper crop of Star Wars Shatterpoint products for pre-order. First up will be the highly anticipated 'This Is Rogue One' squad pack, with two more squad packs to follow, plus new terrain, and new versions of Ahsoka Tano and Darth Vader in the ‘I Am No Jedi’ duel pack.

Continue reading Star Wars Shatterpoint's Vader, Delta Squad, and way more all up for pre-order
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Star Wars Shatterpoint review, The best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion expansions guide
title: Star Wars Shatterpoint's Vader, Delta Squad, and way more all up for pre-order

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The Oldhammer sculpting movement is an informal grouping of professional and amateur model makers who create figures inspired by the classic Games Workshop studio style from ‘80s and early ‘90s Warhammer 40k. Chaos corrupted genius Neil LeFort has made some of the largest figures I’ve ever seen in the Oldhammer style, a collection of grotesque demonic tanks, and is putting them on sale via Kickstarter.

Continue reading These super cursed daemon tanks are pure '80s Warhammer 40k
title: These super cursed daemon tanks are pure '80s Warhammer 40k
